venv/
*.venv/

# Python compiled files
__pycache__/
*.pyc
*.pyo
*.pyd

.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# IDE and editor files
.idea/
.vscode/
*.sublime-workspace

embeddings/
report.pdf
*.log

# Environment variables
.env

*.DS_Store

Thumbs.db
